## PooledValue interface

Pooled resource instance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PooledValue<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [pool](./pooling.pooledvalue.pool.md) |  | Pool&lt;T&gt; | The resource pool |
